scope.title: Select
scope.description: Select provides a means to select a single item from a collapsible list. Use of select helps to reduce input errors and screen space. It's commonly used to help users enter a value into a form field.

data.title: Select
data.description: Select provides a means to select a single item from a collapsible list. Use of select helps to reduce input errors and screen space. It's commonly used to help users enter a value into a form field.
